objects.garnet.name: Garnet
objects.garnet.desc: The namesake of a beautiful princess from a faraway land.
rings.garnet.name: Garnet Ring
rings.garnet.desc: A gold ring adorned with a garnet gemstone. Decreases special move cooldown by 10%.
rings.infinity.name: Infinity Band
rings.amethyst.prefix: A copper ring adorned with an amethyst gemstone.
rings.topaz.prefix: A copper ring adorned with a topaz gemstone.
rings.aquamarine.prefix: A silver ring adorned with an aquamarine gemstone.
rings.jade.prefix: A silver ring adorned with a jade gemstone.
rings.emerald.prefix: A gold ring adorned with an emerald gemstone.
rings.ruby.prefix: A gold ring adorned with a ruby gemstone.
node.garnet.name: Garnet Node
node.garnet.desc: A clump of Garnets encased in stone.
dialogue.emily.gemstones.first: Have you ever really felt a gemstone? Like, the way a topaz melts into your soul, or how a ruby sets your heart on fire?#$b#Gemstones have this incredible way of resonating with our energies. It's like nature's palette of emotions.
dialogue.emily.gemstones.second: One time I tried packing a ring with a bunch of gemstones, to resonate with all of them at once.#$b#But it kept falling apart! Clint said it's because ordinary metals aren't strong enough to handle the overlapping vibrations. So now I just wear a different one every day!
gmcm.craftable_gemstone_rings.title: Craftable Gemstone Rings
gmcm.craftable_gemstone_rings.desc: Add new combat recipes for crafting gemstone rings.
gmcm.audible_gemstones.title: Audible Gemstones
gmcm.audible_gemstones.desc: Whether gemstone frequencies can be heard.
gmcm.chord_sound_duration.title: Chord Sound Duration
gmcm.chord_sound_duration.desc: The duration of the chord sound cue, in milliseconds.
gmcm.colorful_resonances.title: Colorful Resonances
gmcm.colorful_resonances.desc: Whether the resonance glow should inherit the root note's color.
gmcm.resonance_lightsource_texture.title: Resonance Lightsource Texture
gmcm.resonance_lightsource_texture.desc: The texture that will be used for the resonance light source.
